_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
mn14:3.1+mn14:21.21^where_else_mentioned: Rājagaha, the Vulture, Peak Mountain, Isigili, the Black Rock, Māgadha
mn14:3.1+mn14:21.21^who_else_mentioned: Mahānāma, Jain, Nātaputta, Gotama, Seniya Bimbisāra, Bimbisāra
before^mn14:3.1^where: Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery
where: Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery
